        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>lesson plan</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>teacher</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-t-lre">10-14</string>
            <string language="en">10-14</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Introduction
1.	The teacher brings to the classroom some pictures from
 5  European countries (EU members-preferably neighbors ).

2.	The students are expected to associate each picture with appropriate country.

3.	Individual students are asked to come to the political map and stick picture in correct place.

4.	The teacher shows other pictures and asks students about their ideas or associations with these countries.

 Presentation
1.	The teacher makes a short comment about European Union and its anthem. 

2.	Students are provided with basic information which are summarized on the blackboard. 

3.	They listen to the anthem available in:
http://myeurope.eun.org/shared/data/myeurope/2005/los/05/tea-bis/our/anthemen.htm

Practice
1. Students fulfill information with the use of the following links:
 http://myeurope.eun.org/shared/data/myeurope/2005/los/01/vl/contents.htm
      
and once again http://myeurope.eun.org/shared/data/myeurope/2005/los/05/tea-bis/our/anthemen.htm

(extra: 2. Students listen to five fragments of anthems and after that they match them with the countries previously discussed.)


      Feedback
       1.As a feedback students fulfill the following link in groups:

http://myeurope.eun.org/shared/data/myeurope/2005/los/05/corinne/key-facts/key_facts.htm
</string>
          </description>
        </educational>
